backend/main.mo: Defines the chat backend canister with storage mixins, access control, message/chatroom/user types, and state maps for chatrooms, messages, reactions, and profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing refetch fixes across React Query flows with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and key behaviors of major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the root div and loading the Vite/React main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, layout, 404 handling, and wraps the app with theme and toaster providers.

frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog for creating chatrooms with text, media uploads, video links, and Twitter embeds.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the app header with navigation, username editing, and avatar picker support.

frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component that manages playback state, duration loading, waveform visualization, and synchronized pausing of other audio elements.

frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth client lifecycle.

frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles, theme variables, mobile input fixes, layout rules, and custom styles for the voice message player.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides a compact number formatter for values in thousands, millions, or billions.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from Giphy and map API responses into simplified GIF objects.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client-side image compression with resizing, quality control, orientation handling, and progress callbacks.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data into a simplified preview with caching and duplicate-request handling.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed previews, including validation, key building, expiration, and clearing.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Extracts IDs and metadata from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generates corresponding thumbnail or embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin UI for authenticating and deleting chatrooms with password protection, refetching, and table-based management.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a specific chatroom, handling loading, errors, and auto-incrementing view count before rendering ChatArea.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays the lobby chatroom list with search, category filters, and create dialog, using multiple React Query sources and fallback/refetch logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, container settings, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing known issues with React Query inactive chatroom lists and enumerating required refetch-related fixes.
